name: 要来点百合吗 Love Yuri
name_original: 要来点百合吗 Love Yuri
description:
This is a visual novel.

Plot Summary

Shu Yu, a popular writer who has no romantic experience but loves writing yuri love stories,
becomes sisters with Lu Xi, an otaku and experienced online voice actress.
Although they share a strong bond,
their relationship becomes awkward due to their own secrets.
However, when Lu Xi accidentally discovers that her favorite yuri author is actually her sister Shu Yu,
she becomes increasingly attracted to her personality
and a forbidden romance unfolds between them.

What to see in the game

Over 20 beautifully illustrated images
Cute and rich SD illustrations
Voice acting for the main characters
Includes CG appreciation mode

Introduction to the main characters
